content:
# The error persists, indicating that the crafting system still does not recognize the stone I gathered as usable for crafting the stone furnace.
# This could be due to the way resources are categorized or a limitation in the current environment.

# As a workaround, I will attempt to gather additional stones to see if this updates the inventory or resolves the crafting issue.
# I will try to harvest 4 more stones to see if that helps.
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Stone), quantity=4)  # Harvest 4 more stones.
